00039          bool operator == (const VectorElement& elm) const {
00040             return ( (dynamic_cast<const ConnectionElement*> (&elm) )

00042          }
00043

00046             return ( (dynamic_cast<const ConnectionElement*> (&elm) )
00047                         ->m_angle != m_angle );

00052             return ( m_angle >

00054          }
